first_translate: to lady fiona...

hangle: 어라… 저번 편지를 받은 지 얼마 안 됐는데,
first_translate: huh... I just received her last letter not too long ago,
but she’s already sent another one.
fiona, you’re still dealing with this matter...?
dealing with what?
it's taking that long?
well,

hangle: 귀족 가문 하나 무너트리는 게 쉬운 줄 아세요?
first_translate: do you think bringing down a noble family is going to be easy?
I’m doing my best as well.

hangle: 오늘, 황궁의 재무 부서로 익명의 투서를 보냈다.
first_translate: today, I anonymously reported house green to the financial department at the royal palace.

hangle: 그린 가문의 불법적인 사업을 고발하는 내용으로.
first_translate: the report was about their illegal business dealings.
if they find out everything I said is true,
all of house green’s assets will be confiscated by the government.

hangle: 이러니저러니 해도 그린 가의 재산은 상당하니,
first_translate: no matter how much money we lose from all these incidents,

hangle: 황궁도 국고를 채울 좋은 기회라고 생각하지 않을까?
first_translate: the royal palace would probably see this as a good opportunity for them to fill up their treasury.
and two days later--
congratulations on becoming head of our household, brother zen.
congratulations on becoming head of our household, brother zen.
of course, it’s only temporary right now.
still,

hangle: 작은오빠가 아니면 누가 가주 자리에 오르겠어요?
first_translate: who else could take your place if not you?
that’s true...
that’s true...
this is the document I told you about before.

hangle: 여기에 인장을 찍어주시면 전 호적에서 정리되어요.
first_translate: with your seal here, I’ll officially no longer be part of this family.
ah, yes...
now leave me alone.
I have so many things to do.
it does seem like it.
brother zen...
let me tell you something before I go.
sure...
gambling addiction has no cure.
even more so when you’ve accumulated debt because of it.
th-how did you know about that?!
th-how did you know about that?!
then goodbye.
wait, fiona!!!
mmhm~!
I feel better than expected.
lady fiona,
you were still here?!
how shameless can you get?

hangle: 네 오라비의 등골 빼먹을 생각 말고 썩 나가거라.
first_translate: stop trying to suck every penny off your husband and leave us once and for all.
I don’t need anyone telling me to do that,
countess.
before I go though,
I realized there was one thing left to do.
what are you talking about?!
if you’re thinking of any way to stay here,
forget abou--
ooh,
my goodness!!
your grace!!
how dare you...
...do such a thing!

hangle: 다시 생각해보니 역시 한 대 쯤은 때리고 싶어서요.
first_translate: when I thought about it again, I really wanted to slap you at least once.
caindel got kicked out without anything,
and zen will spend his life paying back debts...

hangle: 그러니까 부인도 제게 뺨 정도는 맞아야 공평하지 않을까요?
first_translate: doesn’t it make sense for you to receive some punishment as well?
just what nonsense are you spouting...?!

hangle: 핏줄도 천한 게 정신까지 이상해진 모양이구나.
first_translate: not only are you lowborn, but you must also be mentally ill.

hangle: 누, 누가 이 정신 나간 계집을 가두거라!
first_translate: s-someone lock this crazy woman away!
p-pardon me!
y-your grace.
i-it’s terrible news!
can’t you see what’s happening right now?!
lock this girl u--
n-no,
r-right now,

hangle: 지금 저택 밖에 황궁의 병사가 몰려왔습니다!
first_translate: imperial soldiers are surrounding our manor!
they say it’s under orders of the emperor himself!
oh,
so they came sooner than I expected.
are you aware...

hangle: 아버지와 큰오빠가 마약 사업에 손대고 있던 걸요.
first_translate: ...that father and big brother had been involved in drug trafficking?
which is why...
...I informed the palace about it myself.
as you may very well know yourself,
if it turns out that someone built wealth through illegal businesses,
the state takes over those assets.
y-you lie!
y-you lie!

hangle: 그러면 너도 처벌을 면치 못할 텐데!
first_translate: then you won’t escape being punished either!
that’s the thing.

hangle: 전 이미 이 가문 사람이 아니라서요.
first_translate: I am no longer part of this family anymore.
since I lost my rights, I also lost responsibility toward this family.
th-this doesn’t make sense...

hangle: 네가 지금 키워준 은혜를 원수로 갚는구나!!
first_translate: is this how you repay us after raising you?!
in fact, I tried to let it slide.
that’s because...

hangle: 나에게도 어느 정도 책임이 있을지도 모르겠다는 생각을 했으니까요.
first_translate: ...I felt somewhat responsible for letting it happen.
that’s right.
I didn’t want to waste time getting emotional about it,

hangle: 나도 어느 정도 책임이 있을 거라고… 망설였다.
first_translate: and since I might bear some blame for it... I hesitated.
if I ever meet the original fiona,
if I ever meet the original fiona,
I’d even apologize to her.
but upon reconsidering,
I decided that human decency should have come five years earlier.
from both sides.
keep this close to your heart.

hangle: 앞으로 두 번 다시 못 볼 수도 있잖아요.
first_translate: we never know whether or not we'll see each other again someday.
countess green! she’s here!
aaghk!!

hangle: 그린 백작가가 불법적인 사업을 벌였다는 제보가 있었습니다.
first_translate: there was a tip-off saying that house green ran illegal businesses.

hangle: 때문에 황명에 따라 지금 이 시각부터 모든 가문의 재산을 동결하고…
first_translate: according to the emperor’s order, starting today, all of the family’s property shall be frozen...
the finance ministry works fast.
hmm?

hangle: 그러고 보니 등장인물 중 한 명이 재무부에 있었던 것 같은데…
first_translate: come to think of it, wasn’t one of the characters working at the finance ministry...?
money... yayy...
uughh... so this is what it feels like...
whatever.
I should start heading to hailon manor instead.
no!!
I finally became head of the family after kicking out my own brother!!
hey!! stop!!
put that down!!
really...

hangle: 괜히 북쪽 산맥의 마물들을 지배하는 놈이 아니군.
first_translate: no wonder he rules monsters living in the northern mountains.

hangle: 여태 상대한 놈 중 가장 성가셨어…
first_translate: out of everyone I fought against until now, he was the most annoying...
